timeline.bodyText:
This is not consistent with the PR description.
In the description you say "remove Controller dependencies".
Here, you are removing references from the System test package to the Controller.
A few issues that I'd like resolved:

Make the PR description consistent with the contents of the PR.
Remove the dependency on the controller project from this project's build.gradle section.
I am concerned that this change in particular (swapping Config.* with hardcoded strings) will break if we make a change to those properties at one point.

timeline.bodyText:
nit: This comment is unnecessary and slightly problematic:

The target class may be refactored with a change in name and namespace, and this comment will then go stale. Ideally, classes should be referenced using a @link annotation (when used in JavaDocs) or the like.
A simple text search will easily locate the class where these properties are located, so it shouldn't be necessary to tell the source of these properties.
timeline.author: ravisharda

timeline.bodyText:
There is a lot of code repetition here. Extracting this out to a method that takes only the config name and the value and assumes the component code can simplify this:
javaSysPropertyEntryAsString("zk.connect.uri", zk)

p.s.: The name of the method setSystemProperty() is also misleading. It doesn't really "set the system property", but rather returns a newly created string representing the system property (-Dprop=value). But, that's preexisting code, and you may or may not want to  change that too.
